channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The gap between premium and budget experiences is widening
item.description: Brands are pivoting to focus on premium passengers, leaving budget travelers with a very different experience. What does that mean for travelers in 20...

item.title: All in or nothing: How credit card issuers are building ecosystems to capture your loyalty
item.description: One trend we're watching ahead of 2026 is credit card issuers mirroring airline and hotel programs to build vast loyalty ecosystems to retain customer...

item.title: Why flexibility and maximizing travel tools is the key to a successful 2026 award travel strategy
item.description: As travel brands devalue loyalty programs, transferrable currencies and flexible plans are the key to getting strong value from your points and miles.

item.title: Why this is the easiest time of the year to earn 5 points per dollar spent

item.title: United cardholders can earn 2X miles on rent payments through Bilt — here's how
